# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

function wrap_string(str, text_width::Int = 10)
    # Split the string into individual words
    words = split(str)

    # Initialize an empty string to store the wrapped text
    wrapped_text = ""

    # Iterate over each word and check if the current line length exceeds the maximum width
    for (i, word) in enumerate(words)
        if i > 1 && length(wrapped_text) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            wrapped_text *= "\n"
        end
        wrapped_text *= "$word "
    end

    return wrapped_text
end
